name: Stir fry Pasta
content: Stir fry Paste yada yada yada because of the season
main: This quick chili features ground beef simmered with onion, tomatoes, beans, and seasonings. This easy homemade chili is ready in 15 minutes!

name: Meat Balls
content: Meat Balls yada yada yada because of the season
main: Nothing says football like some chicken wings. The orange glaze makes these wings a touchdown!

name: Burger Meal
content: Burger Meal Paste yada yada yada because of the season
main: This savory stew is inspired by the delicious peanut and tomato West African Maafe dish. The heat from the ginger and red pepper is balanced out by the sweetness of the peanut butter.

name: Fried Indomie
content: Fried Indomie yada yada yada because of the season
main: Sweet or savory, we have got you covered. Stuffed to the brim, these variations will not disappoint.

main: Is it even a party if there aren’t pinwheel sandwiches? Your friends and family will love these handheld snacks during the game.
